TextBlock.Text: DARVY: What- What is this place?
DARVY: Agh, my arm hurts... Why is it so dark?
DARVY: You know what? No. I'm the one who created that portal. I can do this.
DARVY: Let's see here, where's my headlamp? There we go. Now I can see.
DARVY: I have no clue where I am. The atmosphere is thick and electrified, though.
DARVY: Maybe if I continue forward I will-
DARVY: Ow! There's a flipping wall here! Why is it so dense?
DARVY: I need to call for back-up. My radio... the radio... Aha!
DARVY: Hello? Anybody at base? Anybody?
DARVY: Oh no... I'm not getting any response. No static either.
DARVY: Don't panic. Don't panic. Don't panic.
DARVY: I won't die. I won't die. I won't die.
<color=red>(a low, ominous humming can be heard)</color>
DARVY: AAAAAHHHHHHH!!! GET AWAY FROM ME!!!
